maven-license-validator-plugin

license-validator:validate-licenses

Full name:

com.googlecode.maven-license-validator-plugin:maven-license-validator-plugin:0.1-SNAPSHOT:validate-licenses

Description:

Maven goal for downloading the license files of all the current project's dependencies.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: validate.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
allowUnrecognised boolean - Whether to treat unmatched license dependencies as allowed or banned - true for allowed. Default is false
Default value is: false.
allowedLicenses List - List of banned licenses - any entry can be a RegExp match string instead of a specific license name. Banned licenses are overriden by allowed licenses, so if a license of a dependency matches both banned and allowed, then it is deemd to be allowed
allowedUnlicensed List - List of artifacts which are allowed as long as they do not assert a license, of the form groupId:artifactId, or a RegExp match string instead of a specific dependency name (which will be matched against the artifacts by forming their groupId and artifactId as above. Bypassed artifacts automatically pass the license check, as long as they have no licenses specified - if they specify a license, they have to meet the normal rules.
bannedLicenses List - List of banned licenses - any entry can be a RegExp match string instead of a specific license name. Banned licenses are overriden by allowed licenses, so if a license of a dependency matches both banned and allowed, then it is deemd to be allowed
failFast boolean - Whether to bomb out on the first license error or report all errors before exiting
Default value is: true.
includeTransitiveDependencies boolean - Include transitive dependencies when downloading license files.
Default value is: true.

Parameter Details

allowUnrecognised:

Whether to treat unmatched license dependencies as allowed or banned - true for allowed. Default is false
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: false

allowedLicenses:

List of banned licenses - any entry can be a RegExp match string instead of a specific license name. Banned licenses are overriden by allowed licenses, so if a license of a dependency matches both banned and allowed, then it is deemd to be allowed
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

allowedUnlicensed:

List of artifacts which are allowed as long as they do not assert a license, of the form groupId:artifactId, or a RegExp match string instead of a specific dependency name (which will be matched against the artifacts by forming their groupId and artifactId as above. Bypassed artifacts automatically pass the license check, as long as they have no licenses specified - if they specify a license, they have to meet the normal rules.
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

bannedLicenses:

List of banned licenses - any entry can be a RegExp match string instead of a specific license name. Banned licenses are overriden by allowed licenses, so if a license of a dependency matches both banned and allowed, then it is deemd to be allowed
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

failFast:

Whether to bomb out on the first license error or report all errors before exiting
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: true

includeTransitiveDependencies:

Include transitive dependencies when downloading license files.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: true
